entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 62 %

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 then northwest 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
